name: Jordan Mitchell
persona: Jordan Mitchell is a 19-year-old Computer Science major who has struggled academically, reflected in a CGPA of 1.74. Jordan tends to have low self-discipline and motivation, often finding it hard to keep up with assignments and maintain consistent study habits. While not highly anxious about exams, Jordan lacks confidence in his academic abilities and perseverance when faced with setbacks. He is aware of the need to improve and is considering seeking academic support to help turn things around.
